properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_KIND, PET_AGE, PET_GENDER, PET_PRICE, PET_RESCUE, STATUS FROM PET WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PET_RESCUE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PET WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_KIND, PET_AGE, PET_GENDER, PET_PRICE, PET_RESCUE, STATUS FROM PET WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PET_NO DESC;
SELECT * FROM PET WHERE PET_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO PET( PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_KIND, PET_AGE, PET_GENDER, PET_PRICE, PET_RESCUE, STATUS ) VALUES ( 'PE' || SEQ_PET_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
UPDATE PET SET PET_NO = ? , PET_NAME = ? , PET_KIND = ? , PET_AGE = ? , PET_GENDER = ? , PET_PRICE = ? , PET_RESCUE = ? , STATUS = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PET_NO = ?
UPDATE PET SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE PET_NO = ?
SELECT PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_KIND, PET_AGE, PET_GENDER, PET_PRICE, PET_RESCUE, STATUS FROM PET WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
